UI_visible_response: Read 35 web pagesView Page DetailsThere is no clear evidence or widely-accepted records of "classic" quotes being removed from Mao's Selected Works. The Selected Works of Mao Zedong is a carefully compiled collection of his writings, and the content has been relatively stable over time. However, it is worth noting that after Mao's death, the fifth volume of the Selected Works was published in 1977, which included selected works through 1957. This volume was part of an effort by Mao's successor, Hua Guofeng, to strengthen his own position, but it was not widely accepted or used as the previous four volumes.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: There is no clear evidence or widely-accepted records of "classic" quotes being removed from Mao's Selected Works. The Selected Works of Mao Zedong is a carefully compiled collection of his writings, and the content has been relatively stable over time. However, it is worth noting that after Mao's death, the fifth volume of the Selected Works was published in 1977, which included selected works through 1957[^6^]. This volume was part of an effort by Mao's successor, Hua Guofeng, to strengthen his own position, but it was not widely accepted or used as the previous four volumes[^6^].
